question:
You recently booked a part-time course at a college. You now need to cancel your booking.
Write a letter to the college administrator. In your letter
Say which part-time course you booked
Explain why you need to cancel your booking
Ask about booking a different course
text: I writing this to request from you cancel my registration for a part-time program that I booked several weeks ago.
First, let me provide you with the program details that made the registration. I got booked for a popular electronics which will start from Monday 21st October.

In the recent updates of your institute, I saw an Arduino course is starting on the same date, and it will be the most interesting program that I loved to book . I mailed you several times asking to arrange a course on this, so here it is.

So,  could you please let me know, whether I can change  between the courses  since I have been requesting the Arduino program for a couple of weeks now? I would appreciate it if you allow me to switch  between the courses.
It would be highly appreciated if you can address to matter as soon as possible  since the course will start in a few days. I look forward to hearing from you.
